root: ^The four of them arrived to the citty.
^Lima: I'm not s-sure ab-bout this... There are too many humans arround.
^It's was getting late and children where already at home, but teenagers and adults where still around, having fun.
^When people walked by, they kept staring at your group and mumbling.
^???: Look! What a clown, that's not scary!
^???: Yeah! What are you? A hairy gardener?? HAHAHA!
^Tibo turned around and growled at them, showing he's huge mouth full open and he's sharp teeh.
^The teenagers screamed and disapeared in the blink of an eye.
^Tibo: Hrmph! That's how monters are supposed to act.
^Mars: Hey! Isn't that the place you said, Lima?
^You all arrive to an old abbandoned mirror warehouse and there you see Leo, astonished by he's own reflection.
^You can see a flower that looks exactly the same as the one you got earlier, but its growing from the ceiling and none of can reach it.
^Mars: I don't think one of my speels would be enough to get there...
^Lima: I can't find any g-good point to use my robes and swign...
^There's nothing we can do. Push Mars to go back to the forest and keep looking for Terry.
^Leo is the answer! Try to ask him for help.

a: ^Lima: W-wait... Isn't that boy the one w-who walks everywhere up-psidedown?
^Mars: More like who drags everyone's mood upsidedown...
^Lima approaches Leo and tries to convince him to help. He's got his head on the clouds and doesn't even hears her. She tries again, but Leo shuses her and keeps looking at his reflection.
^Mars: There's no point. We'll come again tomorrow with someone that can reach up there.
^Tibo: There's no need (may my plant rest in peace). Hey, bandage pal!
^Tibo yeled at Lima in a hard voice and she jumped scared.
^Mars: It's about time we go back.
b: ^You walk to Leo and give him a gentle push.
^Leo: Hey friend, it's not the time, I'm doing important stuff here.
^You try again to get his help and step between him and the mirror, using your best baby doll eyes.
^Leo: Fine, fine! What do you want?!
^Lima explains the situation and Leo sighs.
^Leo: Ok, I'll go. Guess that flower wanted to be picked up only by the most capable one (ofcourse, that's me).
^Leo uses his hability to reach the celing and walt towards the flower. Right before he get's it, Lima says something about poisonous sap.
^The sap of the flower dropped in Leo's eye and he fell off to the ground, moaning.
^He got burned by the poison of the flower.
^Mars: O-oh... that will leave a scar.
^He flew away as quick as the wind.
^Mars: Poor prince, not even his own reflection would be up to his standars anymore.
^Lima: Oh no! I s-should have warned him earlier! What a dis-saster...
^Mars: There's nothing we can do now, anyway.
^2. Pull Mars robes. Let's follow him! He needs support now.
a2: ^Mars: It's getting late, we should go back.
b2: ^Lima: He's right, w-we should follow him...
